text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    BLDPRDBlood ProductA manufactured product that is produced from the raw blood oi a donor with the intention of using it in a recipient transfusion.
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-VaccineEntityType

name: XMedicine
title: x_Medicine
description: A type of Administered Substance that is manufactured from raw organic or inorganic ingredients and used in the course of a patient's therapy.
